metadata.title: CVE-2016-6703 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in an Android runtime library inAndroid 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.xbefore 2016-11-01 could enable an attacker using a specially craftedpayload to execute arbitrary code in the context of an unprivilegedprocess. This issue is rated as High due to the possibility of remote codeexecution in an application that uses the Android runtime. Android ID:A-30765246.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
